text.div:
Staphylococcus Aureus (Tests by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    13317-3 Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    52969-3 Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus [Presence] in Nose by Organism specific culture
    53572-4 Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus [Presence] in Genital specimen by Organism specific culture
    73558-9 Staphylococcus aureus and Staphylococcus sp.coagulase negative rRNA [Identifier] by FISH in Positive blood culture
    76081-9 Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus [Presence] in Pharynx by Organism specific culture
    85042-0 Staphylococcus aureus glycopeptide resistant identified [Type] in Isolate
    85045-3 Staphylococcus aureus glycopeptide resistant based on vancomycin and teicoplanin IC [Identifier] by ARD gradient strip
    85765-6 Staphylococcus aureus DNA [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture
    88269-6 Staphylococcus aureus gyrB gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    92777-2 Staphylococcus aureus DNA [Presence] by NAA with probe detection in Positive blood culture
